title: Celebrating #MenInProgress
description:
Why don’t men seek help from medical professionals? Sometimes it’s uncomfortable to share what’s bothering us, or that we feel afraid of being judged. We want to change that.

For the next month, we’ll be creating a safe space for men to talk to our medical directors and learn about those difficult topics. We’ll face all health concerns – big or small – together.

We are #MenInProgress
